doc.title: Chris Barber: As We Like It
doc.plot: AS WE LIKE IT presents the Jazz & Blues legend Chris Barber in an exclusive one night only performance, filmed live in-front of an invited studio audience at Classic T Stage, Shepperton Film Studios. This is classic Chris Barber, an absolute icon in the world of Jazz, alongside his full eleven-piece band performing hit tracks such as Petite Fleur, numbers from the critically acclaimed 2007 album Can't Stop Now, plus a host of material from the like of Miles Davis, Duke Ellington, Sonny Terry & Brownie McGhee and the Dorsey Brothers in what Blues Matters Magazine described as "a terrific performance". Featuring the Big Chris Barber Band and a special guest appearance from Andy Fairweather-Low on 'Worried Man Blues', 'Lay My Burden Down' and 'Will The Circle Be Unbroken'.
